generalMessages.content:
The {siteName} processes all publishing requests each business day, between 4PM EST and 6PM EST, unless a specific date/time is requested.

All requests received after 4PM EST may not be processed until the next business day.

If you have any questions about this policy or need a publish request processed immediately, please email the administrator.

cannedMessages.content: This content has multiple spelling errors and/or grammatical errors. Please correct and re-submit.
This content uses incorrect or outdated terms, images, and/or colors. Please correct and re-submit.

This content has non-working links that may be due to incomplete and/or mistyped URLs. Any links directing users to external sites, or directing users to a document must open in a new browser window. Please correct and re-submit.

completeMessages.content:
An email notification has been sent to the team. Your content will be reviewed and (if approved) pushed live between 4PM EST and 6PM EST of the business day that the request was received. If this request is sent after business hours, it will be reviewed and (if approved) pushed live as soon as possible, the next business day.

If you need to make further revisions to this item, please re-submit this publish request after making them.

If this request needs immediate attention, please email the administrator.
Item(s) has been pushed for delete. It will be deleted shortly.
Item(s) has been pushed live. It will be visible on the live site shortly.
The scheduled item(s) will go live on: ${date}.
Rejection has been sent. Item(s) have NOT been pushed live and have returned to draft state.
Item(s) has been pushed for delete. It will be deleted shortly.
Item(s) have been scheduled to go live.

Error:
